content:
2 questions: 1. Where do I commit state machine diagrams to in SVN? 2. Does the diagram have to be svg format? if so, how to I get it into svg format?

I have jpegs in my local Publish folder and that works in my local build, but don't know where to commit them in the official build. These are diagrams for ResearchStudy and ResearchSubject. Thanks.
jpg or pngs are OK they go in [build-root]/images
I've committed the 2 pngs to images in SVN, however, the diagrams are not appearing. Any thoughts about what could be going wrong? Thx.

I've committed the 2 pngs to images in SVN, however, the diagrams are not appearing. Any thoughts about what could be going wrong? Thx.

Per Lloyd: Also need to add the 2 image file names to publish.ini.
